meanings.definition: A substance that adds iodine to something.
meanings.sent1: The iodizer helped increase the iodine content in the salt.
meanings.sent2: I bought an iodizer to make sure my diet includes enough iodine.
meanings.sent3: The iodizer and the salt shaker had a race to see who could iodize faster.
meanings.sent4: The iodizer was like a magician, magically turning plain salt into iodized salt.
meanings.sent5: The iodizer hummed as it sprinkled iodine, transforming the salt into a healthier option.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that iodizes.
meanings.sent1: The diligent iodizer ensured that all salt packets were properly iodized.
meanings.sent2: The iodizer in the factory worked tirelessly to iodize the salt batches.
meanings.sent3: The iodizer at the party was the star, making sure everyone's snacks were iodized.
meanings.sent4: The iodizer was like a superhero, swooping in to iodize the salt and save the day.
meanings.sent5: The iodizer's precision in iodizing the salt was unmatched, guaranteeing top-quality products.
